Name: 推箱子
About the game: '推箱子' is a casual game. The player controls a villain to push the box to a designated place. The player can only push the box forward at the back of the box. Once the box is pushed down to the edge or corner, the box cannot be reversed, and the game will fail. Players need to plan the route of pushing the box in advance to pass the pass smoothly. [Game Operation] Direction keys control movement. [Game features] The goal is to train your logical thinking ability. In a narrow space, it is required to place the wooden box at the designated position. If you are not careful, the box will not move or the passage will be blocked. Therefore, you need to skillfully use the limited space and passage, and reasonably arrange the order and position of movement to successfully complete the task. The difficulty of the game will become more and more difficult as the number of levels increases. It is not easy to pass the level!
